channel.title: Trinity 742 - Updates daily - Active staff - Client available
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/g0dwZCc.gif[/img] [font=Impact][size=xx-large]Trinity742![/size][/font]
[size=large]Download client!! Web-client[/size] [size=large]will be added soon![/size]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/qsnio4.png[/img][url=http://trinity742.com/play]Play Now[/url][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/qsnio4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2ak0aw1.png[/img][url=http://trinity742.com/community]Forums[/url][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2ak0aw1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2aaim9x.png[/img][url=https://rspsdata.org/system/store.php?id=342]Donate[/url][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2aaim9x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/30lnifq.gif[/img][url=http://trinity742.com/vote]Vote[/url][IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/30lnifq.gif[/img]
[size=x-large]What we have at the moment:[/size]
[ul][*] VPS Hosted [*]10Gb/s DDoS protected [*] 24/7 [*] No lag [*] Stable Economy [*] 100% Uptime [*] Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic [*] 138 combat, summoning counts [*] Daily Updates [*] Professional and active Staff [*] Active Clean Forums [*] Old and new Runescape Armor [*] DonatorZones (with shops) [*] Loyalty point system with shop [*] Various shops. [*] Dominion Tower [*] Lava Flow Mining [*] Jadinko Lair [*] Glacors 100% working [*] Bork [*] Tormented Demons [*] Corporeal Beast [*] Nomad [*] Custom trimmed and untrimmed comp cape requirements. [*] Prestiging [*] Skilling point system [*] New Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin) [*] Squeal of fortune. [*] Bone's on altar. [*] Hunter. [*] Construction [*] Fully working Nex. [*] Curses, ancients etc. [*] Working Revenants. [*] Queen Black Dragon [*] Custom Donator boss [*] Blink boss [*] Party Demon boss [*] Fight Kiln [*] Fight Caves [*] Custom Dung! [*] Working Chaotics [*] Working Drygores [*] Death Cape [*] Difficulties [*] Ascension Crossbow [*] Trinity Armour (special armour set) [*] Working Flowers and Dicing [*] Money pouch [*] Working clan wars! [*] Great staff and community [*] fully working slayer and slayer tower! [*] Auto-Voting [*] Auto-Donate [*] Great PvP and switching [*] Owner takes all ideas into consideration. [*] Perfect switching [*] unique home [*] and much more! [*] Custom bosses[/ul]
[url=http://trinity742.com/home]JOIN NOW![/url]
MEDIA: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DXOReBi.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u68I5gP.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ILS4hfI.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/oi505k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aNFYpWX.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BbFYYcm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2qly7wk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/643tde.png[/img]
